name: market for ethyl tert-butyl ether | ethyl tert-butyl ether | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9248/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'ethyl tert-butyl ether', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;ethyl tert-butyl ether'  is an organic substance with a CAS no. : 000637-92-3. It is called '2-ethoxy-2-methylpropane' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: C6H14O. It is liquid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure and appears as a colourless to slight yellow liquid with a characteristic odour. It is modelled as a pure substance.  On a consumer level, is used in the following products: fuels. There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on industrial sites.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'ethyl tert-butyl ether',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'ethyl tert-butyl ether',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
